oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Daguerreotype of unknown Confederate soldier and wife
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cased, brass-matted daguerreotype of an unidentified Confederate soldier and a woman thought to be his wife. Both are seated, and pose with their hands in their laps. Young man wears a uniform jacket and vest. His companion wears a gingham dress.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
